title: An Act temporarily protecting recently widowed spouses from foreclosure

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Sousa of Framingham, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1329) of Priscila S. Sousa that mortgage lenders delay foreclosure proceedings after certain borrower deaths.  Financial Services.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Financial Services
